event.title: the 1960s, the term paltik was given

data.event: In the 1960s, the term paltik was given to the homemade (and illegal) guns.

event.title: the early 1990s the industry was legalized

data.event: In the early 1990s the industry was legalized by the government, with the creation of two organizations of local gunsmiths.
The organization now left with proper permit is Workers League of Danao Multi-purpose Cooperative (World MPC), in Dungguan, Danao City.
